channel.title: How do I make a chat log and
channel.description: How do I make a chat log and a list of players online? I want a chat log that goes into a folder with the text and character. I also want to know how to get a list of players online as a command or preferably on my control panel/GUI. I am using torvapkz v1 (PI ErasedPkz). Please help me! Thank you everyone!

item.title: How do I make a chat log and
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

Tysm what about the chat log?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a chat log and
item.dc:creator: @Inception-X Inception-X
item.description:
@Inception-X wrote:

to add the “;;players” command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "There are currently " + World.getPlayers().size() + " players playing " + Settings.SERVER_NAME + "."); return true; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a chat log and
